synopsis.text: He avily immersed in the futuristic world of virtual reality gaming, thousands of players find themselves trapped in the popular MMORPG, Sword Art Online (SAO). Using advanced NerveGear technology, gamers control their in-game avatars with their minds, making the experience incredibly realistic. However, this excitement turns into a living nightmare when they discover that the game's creator has removed the logout option, forcing them to complete all 100 levels to escape. The stakes are dangerously high, as death in the game results in death in the real world. Among these desperate players is Kazuto "Kirito" Kirigaya, a skilled beta tester who must now form alliances and face the game's treacherous challenges to survive and break free from the virtual prison.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
